system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user ends their activation. If the weather is Rain, the user does the Set-Up and resolves Electro Shot on the same activation. 
Resolution: On their next activation, they attack with and resolve Electro Shot.

actions.name: Electro Shot
actions.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user ends their activation. If the weather is Rain, the user does the Set-Up and resolves Electro Shot on the same activation.
